<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Anointed Waterskin](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1037)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Divine" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=48" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Good" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=83" />
<trait label="Water" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=165" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 179 <sup>2.0</sup>

_[**PFS Note**](/pathfinder-society) The holy water generated by an anointed waterskin does not persist beyond the end of a session and has an effective sale price of 0 gp._

**Price** 600 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This waterskin coruscates with holy energy, causing it to slowly fill itself with special blessed water unique to the item. After using any of the activations, the waterskin is empty, but slowly refills itself. It becomes full enough to use again at the next dawn.

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> command, Interact;    **Requirements** The _anointed waterskin_ is full; **Effect** You throw the _anointed waterskin_ up to 60 feet. The water explodes out of it, with the effects of [_holy cascade_](/Spells.aspx?ID=151) with a DC of 25.

**Activate** <actions string="Single Action" /> Interact;    **Requirements** The _anointed waterskin_ is full; **Effect** You drink the water within the waterskin, granting you the effects of [_bless_](/Spells.aspx?ID=25). As normal with the spell, you can increase the radius with a single action with the [concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32) trait.

**Activate** <actions string="" /> 1 minute (command, Interact);    **Requirements** The _anointed waterskin_ is full; **Effect** You decant the water, creating up to 10 vials of [_holy water_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=245). You must provide the vials.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
